nav.footerDescription: Providing high-quality AI image and video generation services for e-commerce businesses
nav.independenceDisclaimer: Independence Disclaimer: Viecom uses third-party AI models (such as Google's Gemini, OpenAI's models, and other AI service providers) to power our content generation services. These AI models are provided by their respective owners and are subject to their own terms and conditions. Viecom is an independent service provider and our platform, features, and services are our own proprietary products. We are not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by these AI model providers.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Viecom AI

q1.question: How does the credit system work?
q1.answer: Credits are used for AI generations. Image generation costs 5-30 credits depending on the model (e.g., Nano Banana 5 credits, Nano Banana Pro 30 credits). Videos cost 15-130 credits depending on model and resolution. Free users get 15 signup credits. Pro plans include 500-900 monthly credits. You can also purchase credit packs starting at $9.90 for 200 credits.

q2.question: What's included in the Free plan?
q2.answer: Free users get 15 credits on signup, daily check-in rewards (2 credits/day), referral rewards (10 credits), and social share rewards (2 credits). You can generate images and videos using these credits, with batch generation support (1 concurrent) and 7-day asset display.

q3.question: What video models and resolutions are available?
q3.answer: We offer Sora 2 (720p only, 15-20 credits) and Sora 2 Pro (720p/1080p, 45-130 credits) for 10s or 15s videos. Sora 2 Pro delivers higher quality with faster generation times. All plans can access both models using credits.

q4.question: Can I use generated content commercially?
q4.answer: Yes! Pro and Pro+ subscribers receive a full commercial license for all generated images and videos. You can use them for advertising, social media, e-commerce listings, and any commercial purpose without attribution.

q5.question: How does batch generation work?
q5.answer: Upload multiple images or prompts to generate content in batches. Free users can process 1 concurrent task, Pro users get 3 concurrent tasks, and Pro+ users get 10. Our smart queue prioritizes 720p tasks for faster feedback on mixed batches.

q6.question: What is brand analysis and how does it help?
q6.answer: Our AI analyzes your website or uploaded assets to extract your brand's color palette, tone, and style. This ensures all generated content maintains 100% brand consistency across images and videos, saving you hours of manual editing.

q7.question: Can I upgrade, downgrade, or cancel anytime?
q7.answer: Yes! You can upgrade immediately (prorated billing), downgrade at next billing cycle, or cancel anytime. Downgrades take effect at renewal to preserve your current period benefits. Credits roll over within the same plan tier.

q8.question: What image generation models are available?
q8.answer: We offer multiple AI models: Nano Banana (5 credits) for standard quality, and Nano Banana Pro (30 credits) for premium quality with enhanced detail and realism. Nano Banana Pro delivers superior results for professional e-commerce content with better brand consistency and higher resolution output.

q9.question: What happens when I run out of credits?
q9.answer: You have several options: (1) Purchase one-time credit packs starting at $9.90 for 200 credits (packs never expire), (2) Upgrade to Pro/Pro+ for monthly credit allocations (500-900 credits/month), or (3) Earn credits daily through check-ins (2 credits/day), referrals (10 credits per referral), and social sharing (2 credits per share). Credit packs are perfect if you need extra credits without committing to a subscription.

pricingPage.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricingPage.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your business needs. Upgrade or downgrade anytime.
pricingPage.rewardsBadge: All plans include daily check-in rewards and referral bonuses
pricingPage.creditPacksSubtitle: Need extra credits? Purchase credit packs without a subscription
pricingPage.faqA1: Yes, get 15 free credits on signup. No credit card required. Perfect for trying out our AI video and image generation.
pricingPage.faqA2: Free plan: {signupCredits} credits sign-up bonus (one-time). Pro: {proCredits} credits/month (${proPrice}). Pro+: {proplusCredits} credits/month (${proplusPrice}). Credits cost {minCost}-{maxCost} per generation depending on model and settings.
pricingPage.faqQ3: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
pricingPage.faqA3: Yes, you can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your subscription at any time. Changes take effect on your next billing cycle.
pricingPage.faqQ4: What payment methods do you accept?
pricingPage.faqA4: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and support secure payment processing through Creem.
pricingPage.faqA5: Monthly subscription credits reset each billing cycle. Credit packs purchased separately never expire.

maliciousRegistration.title: 3.1 Prohibition of Malicious Registration
maliciousRegistration.description: Users are strictly prohibited from creating multiple accounts or engaging in any form of malicious registration to obtain sign-up bonus credits. If Viecom discovers that a user has maliciously registered multiple accounts to obtain sign-up bonus credits, Viecom reserves the right to immediately ban and close such accounts without prior notice or user consent. In such cases, all images and videos previously generated by the banned account will no longer be saved or accessible, and Viecom will not be liable for any loss of content or data resulting from such account closure.
